project_name.justification: The text states: "Successfully acquired two key gold projects - the intermediate stage Baxter Spring project in Nevada, and the Flint project in the re-emerging Flint gold camp in Idaho."

company_name.justification: The acquiring company is identified as "Huntsman Exploration Inc. (TSXV:HMAN)(OTC PINK:BBBMF) (the "Company " or "Huntsman")".

ceo_buyer.justification: The text identifies the CEO of the buyer, Huntsman Exploration Inc., as: "Peter Dickie, President and Chief Executive Officer".

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The text states that Huntsman "acquired" the Flint project, but does not specify the percentage of interest acquired.

primary_commodity.justification: The text describes the acquisition as a "Strategic Gold Project Acquisitions" and refers to the project as the "Flint project in the re-emerging Flint gold camp in Idaho."

verified_article_link.justification: The provided text is a corporate update from Huntsman Exploration Inc. that details the acquisition of the Flint project, which matches the project of interest. No URL was provided in the source text.

currency.justification: The acquiring company, Huntsman Exploration Inc., is listed on the TSX Venture Exchange (TSXV), a Canadian exchange, as stated: "Huntsman Exploration Inc. (TSXV:HMAN)". This implies the currency is Canadian Dollars (CAD).

cash_payments_raw.justification: The press release announces the acquisition of the Flint project but does not disclose any of the financial terms of the acquisition agreement, such as cash payments.

share_payments_raw.justification: The press release announces the acquisition of the Flint project but does not disclose any of the financial terms of the acquisition agreement, such as share payments.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The press release announces the acquisition of the Flint project but does not disclose any of the financial terms of the acquisition agreement.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: The press release announces the acquisition of the Flint project but does not disclose any of the financial terms of the acquisition agreement, such as the number of shares issued.

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any share warrant payments as part of the acquisition terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: The text does not mention any option payments as part of the acquisition terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The press release announces the acquisition of the Flint project but does not disclose the price of any shares that may have been issued as part of the transaction.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: The text mentions a plan to commence work but does not specify a drilling commitment in meters.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions a plan to commence work but does not specify a monetary exploration commitment.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The text does not mention any Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) as part of the transaction terms for the Flint project.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The text states the project is a "Gold-silver project in low-risk jurisdiction covering 1,845 ha."

coverage_area_unit.justification: The text states the project is a "Gold-silver project in low-risk jurisdiction covering 1,845 ha."

resource_size.justification: The text does not provide a mineral resource estimate for the Flint project itself. It only mentions resources on an adjacent property owned by Integra Resources and historical production from veins that are explicitly stated to be "not in the Agreement".

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The text identifies the buyer and its ticker as: "Huntsman Exploration Inc. (TSXV:HMAN)(OTC PINK:BBBMF)".
